comments.body: nit: the example could be a more generic, but it's ok to me!

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +107,111 @@- name: Run a manifest with debug, log to both syslog and stdout, specify module path
  puppet:
    modulepath: /etc/puppet/modules:/opt/stack/puppet-modules:/usr/share/openstack-puppet/modules
    logdest: all
    manifest: /var/lib/example/puppet_step_config.pp
